t:test_case.t:objective: basic system check
login as the admin
Create an account with valid username and password

Attempt to set mail using ModifyAccountRequest - mail is immutable
Modify an account and set mail to some invalid value
Modify an account with zimbraPrefShowSearchString TRUE/FALSE
Modify an account and set zimbraPrefShowSearchString= Invalid values - True/blank/sometext/special character
Modify an account and set zimbraPrefSkin to lavender/steel
Modify an account and set zimbraPrefSkin to color/spchar/sometext/negative
Modify an account with zimbraPrefHtmlEditorDefaultFontColor to black
Modify an account and set zimbraPrefHtmlEditorDefaultFontColor= Invalid values color/number/blank/sometext/special character/neagative
Modify an account and set zimbraPrefHtmlEditorDefaultFontFamily to Times New Roman/Arial Black
Modify an account and set zimbraPrefHtmlEditorDefaultFontFamily to blank/spchar/sometext/negative
Modify an account and set zimbraPrefComposeFormat to text/html/
Modify an account and set zimbraPrefComposeFormat to blank/spchar/sometext/negative
Modify an account with zimbraPrefHtmlEditorDefaultFontSize to 8
Modify an account and set zimbraPrefHtmlEditorDefaultFontSize= Invalid values - /blank/sometext/special character/neagative/large number/zero
Modify an account with zimbraPrefTimeZoneId to given timezone
Modify an account and set zimbraPrefTimeZoneId= Invalid values -spaces /blank/sometext/special character/neagative/zero/largenumber
Modify an account with zimbraPrefCalendarFirstDayOfWeek to 0
Modify an account and set zimbraPrefCalendarFirstDayOfWeek= Invalid values - /blank/sometext/special character/neagative/large number/
Modify an account with zimbraPrefCalendarInitialView to given view
Modify an account and set zimbraPrefCalendarInitialView= Invalid values - /blank/sometext/special character/spaces/negative/zero/largenumber
